welcome.subject: Welcome to {company_name} - Let's Connect!
welcome.content:
Dear {first_name},

Thank you for your interest in our services. We noticed you've been exploring our solutions and wanted to reach out personally.

Would you be interested in a brief call to discuss how we can help {company_name} achieve its goals?

Best regards,
Your Name

follow_up.subject: Following up on your interest in our solutions
follow_up.content:
Hi {first_name},

I noticed you recently downloaded our {content_name}. I'd love to hear your thoughts and discuss how we could implement similar solutions for {company_name}.

Would you have 15 minutes this week for a quick chat?

Best,
Your Name

meeting_request.content:
Hi {first_name},
